data:
Based on the product information, I generated multiple sets of 20 ideas (3 words maximum) for each of the categories: Features, Architecture, Risks, Business (Goals, Markets, Users, Targets). Here are the results:

**Features**

**All Ideas:**

1. Risk Analysis Tool
2. AI Powered Learning
3. Occupational Safety Training
4. Interactive Learning Platform
5. Real Time Feedback
6. Customized Training Plans
7. Gamification Elements
8. Virtual Reality Training
9. Real World Scenarios
10. Personalized Learning Paths
11. Expert Insights Integration
12. Compliance Tracking System
13. Employee Engagement Module
14. Performance Metrics Analysis
15. Automated Training Scheduling
16. Multi Language Support
17. Accessibility Features
18. Mobile App Integration
19. Social Sharing Options
20. Leaderboard Comparison

**Key Ideas:**

1. Risk Analysis Tool
2. AI Powered Learning
3. Interactive Learning Platform
4. Customized Training Plans
5. Real Time Feedback

**Architecture**

**All Ideas:**

1. Cloud Based Infrastructure
2. Microservices Architecture
3. AI Powered Algorithm
4. Machine Learning Integration
5. Data Analytics Platform
6. User Friendly Interface
7. Multi Device Support
8. Real Time Data Updates
9. Automated Backup System
10. Scalable Database Design
11. Secure Data Storage
12. API Integration
13. Web Based Interface
14. Mobile App Integration
15. Social Media Integration
16. Email Integration
17. CRM Integration
18. ERP Integration
19. Customizable Dashboard
20. Analytics Reporting

**Risks**

**All Ideas:**

1. Employee Injury Risk
2. Workplace Hazard Identification
3. Compliance Risk Assessment
4. Data Security Risk
5. Cybersecurity Threats
6. Human Error Risk
7. Equipment Failure Risk
8. Natural Disaster Risk
9. Employee Training Risk
10. Regulatory Compliance Risk
11. Business Continuity Risk
12. Reputation Risk
13. Financial Risk
14. Operational Risk
15. Supply Chain Risk
16. IT System Risk
17. Network Security Risk
18. Data Breach Risk
19. Insider Threat Risk
20. Physical Security Risk

**Goals**

**All Ideas:**

1. Reduce Workplace Accidents
2. Improve Employee Safety
3. Enhance Compliance
4. Increase Employee Engagement
5. Reduce Training Costs
6. Improve Business Continuity
7. Enhance Reputation
8. Increase Revenue
9. Improve Operational Efficiency
10. Reduce Risk Exposure
11. Improve Employee Retention
12. Enhance Customer Satisfaction
13. Improve Employee Productivity
14. Reduce Employee Turnover
15. Improve Business Growth
16. Enhance Market Share
17. Improve Employee Morale
18. Reduce Employee Absenteeism
19. Improve Employee Health
20. Enhance Employee Wellbeing
